title: Hour 3 - Judd Apatow (06-12-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Judd Apatow (06-12-20)
description:
Judd Apatow says if he had to choose one title for himself it would be Comedian. Judd tells Dan that a good comedian likes to hang out with other good comedians.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
